data.name: Project Genesis - Gold Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
Important!!!

To receive in-game items, be sure to log into the Project Genesis website!


About the Game

GOLD FOUNDERS PACK
(note: If you purchased Project Genesis, this DLC is included with your game purchase)

The archetype of value for millennia, GOLD has been the alchemists’ holy grail for centuries. The GOLD PACK is for the FOUNDER who requires their personas to convey the priceless and perennial. This Founder Pack contains an animated GOLD emblem, an animated GOLD FOUNDERS Kill Card banner, the remastered version of the Project Genesis Original Soundtrack (FUTURE RELEASE), the unique FOUNDERS SKIN for the FUTURE Rogers Roughnecks battle craft and 1999 CREDITS provided in the near FUTURE.

Items in the Gold Founders Pack include:

  • Gold Founder Emblem
  • Gold Founder Banner
  • Founders Pack Color Palette
  • Remastered OST (future release)
  • Founders battle craft Skin (Roger’s Roughnecks - future release)
  • 1999 Bonus Credits (future release)

*If you're already an owner of this pack and don't see your items in-game, please re-link Steam to your account profile on projectgenesis.com and login again into the game to receive your items. Contact us with any further issues.

data.short_description: You have an affinity for the flashy style! Show it off with the Gold Founders Pack and show your support for Project Genesis as a Founder!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel of AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Project Genesis - Gold Founders Pack
